Articles.Content:
The all-eternal question: Coke, Pepsi, or Other?

- - - Updated - - -

Also, if you click Other, please SPECIFY what you mean, if you know what I mean.
Cola.
Coffee
Coffee, absolutely. By itself?... Pepsi. For a mixed drink (Cuba Libre), Coke... with a big wedge of fresh lime of course.

Between the two, coke.

From the set of all colas, Doctor Pepper.

From the set of all beverages, coffee or beer, depending on how long it's been since I woke up.

> 
> Coffee, absolutely. By itself?... Pepsi. For a mixed drink (Cuba Libre), Coke... with a big wedge of fresh lime of course.

With hot water usually ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

'tis the stuff of life, and I think has probably been the fuel behind the engineering and space industries more than anything else.

I like Dr. Pepper, Mountain Dew, and Birch Beer the best when it comes to pops. Coke & Pepsi taste too "heavy"; I don't like the taste of them at all and they aren't refreshing like the 3 pops I named. Other than that, herbal tea (Only have it once in a while, don't ask me about it, I know nothing other than that it tastes good & relaxing) and straight ice water are the only things I drink.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T06:35:09Z" title="05/28/2015 06:35  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by Flymetothemun**
Prefer Coke, it has a sharpness you don't get with Pepsi. I see the appeal though.

Coke. As if there was a choice?! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Like in the film "The Invention of Lying" Pepsi has an advert on the side of a bus that reads: "Pepsi, for when there is no Coke"
Coke because it seems to fizz up more and stay fizzy for longer.
i just say [Almdudler](https://www2.almdudler.com/).

I'm missing a poll option: Neither.

Both are way to sweet and way too acidic for my taste.

I rarely had Pepsi so I can't really decide between the two of them, but I prefer Cockta, which looks similar because of caramel coloring, but it's quite a different tasting beverage first made in early 50s.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ClEmENo-6Ag?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

It does not contain caffeine or phosphoric acid, but it is sour because of ascorbic acid and rose hip extract.
diet coke > diet pepsi > everything else > mountain dew

DOCTOR PEPPA

YEAH

(actually off brand Dr. Choice is my fav)

I long longer partake of such cesspools of sugar, but back when I did it was Coke over Pepsi, every time. Especially when used as mix for my drinks. But I've progressed over the years, the ratio of coke/water as mix in my drinks slowly decreased to the point where it is all now water as my mixer. It's the healthy choice.

Moxie (removed)!!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![moxiecan.jpg](http://behindtheheadlinesblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/moxiecan.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T19:40:39Z" title="05/28/2015 07:40  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by Rainbowtrout**
  
PG Police

I only drink the finest Drano.

If I'm slumming, though, I'll go for straight Bosco.

And if that's not available, water is my drink of choice.

Now that would be an interesting poll, for chocolate milk: Yoohoo, Bosco, Nestle's Quick, or Hershey's Chocolate. Of course those are American brands, I'm not up on the international market for chocolate milk.

> 
> Now that would be an interesting poll, for chocolate milk: Yoohoo, Bosco, Nestle's Quick, or Hershey's Chocolate. Of course those are American brands, I'm not up on the international market for chocolate milk.

What about all those store brands? Wawa, America's Choice, Great Value, etc. Ugh. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

**"No** **mom I'** **m not** on drugs **I'm** okay, I was **just** thinking you know, why don't you get me a **Pepsi**. ... **All I wanted was a Pepsi**, **just** one **Pepsi, and she wouldn't give it to me**."

On an actual note: Other, at least 4 shots of espresso in the morning. With a starter cup of coffee, and a refill at about noon after lunch.
coke or pepsi? how about neither i highly dislike carbinated drinks so water it is.
Mt. Dew code red. I have approx. 9 billion empty cans of it lying around to attest to how much I like it.

Take a third option: Sprite/Sierra Mist/Mountain Dew. I love my lemon-lime sodas.

If you want a cola, there's this Malaysian cola that I really like.

> 
> What about all those store brands? Wawa, America's Choice, Great Value, etc. Ugh. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

*Oh my!* You've said the magic word: **Wawa!** They have *the* best coffee anywhere. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
